title: Services Overview Section
description:
Homepage Services Section with Featured Service Cards

Create a responsive services showcase section for the homepage that displays 3-4 key service offerings in an organized grid layout to help visitors quickly understand available services.

Requirements:
- Design and implement a responsive grid layout that adapts across breakpoints (mobile: 1 column, tablet: 2 columns, desktop: 3-4 columns)
- Create service cards for: Website Design, SEO Optimization, Maintenance, and one additional service (to be determined or left flexible)
- Each service card must include:
  - Icon or relevant visual element representing the service
  - Clear, descriptive service title
  - Brief description (2-3 sentences maximum) explaining the service value
  - Optional 'Learn More' link/button that can route to service detail pages
- Ensure consistent card sizing and spacing throughout the grid
- Apply hover states or subtle animations to enhance interactivity
- Maintain visual hierarchy with proper typography scale
- Ensure sufficient color contrast for accessibility
- Consider empty/loading states if service data is fetched dynamically
- Make the number of displayed cards configurable (support 3 or 4 cards)

Technical Considerations:
- Use semantic HTML for proper structure
- Implement using CSS Grid or Flexbox for layout
- Ensure touch-friendly target sizes on mobile (minimum 44x44px for interactive elements)
- Optimize icon/image assets for web delivery
- Support future extensibility for adding more service cards
